title: Totitos Rewards System - Gamification and Engagement
content:
TOTITOS REWARDS SYSTEM

WHAT THEY ARE:
Totitos are virtual points that users earn for helping animals. They're a fun way to recognize and celebrate every action that supports animal rescue, no matter how big or small.

HOW USERS EARN TOTITOS:
- Making a donation (any amount)
- Sharing a case with others
- Completing their profile
- Engaging with rescue content
- Participating in community activities
- Regular app usage and engagement

PURPOSE:
- Recognize and celebrate every contribution
- Gamify the helping experience
- Encourage ongoing engagement
- Build a sense of community achievement
- Make helping animals more engaging and fun

KEY ASPECTS:
- Virtual rewards (not cash value)
- Visual progress tracking
- Achievement unlocks and milestones
- Leaderboards and community recognition
- Personal impact visualization

WHEN TO MENTION TOTITOS:
- After user makes a donation
- When user shares a case
- If user asks about rewards or points
- To encourage engagement
- When celebrating user contributions

IMPORTANT MESSAGING:
- Totitos are about recognition, not value
- Every action counts and is celebrated
- Fun way to track your impact
- Community building tool

WHAT TOTITOS ARE NOT:
- Not currency or money
- Not redeemable for cash
- Not a requirement to help
- Not a payment system

es.note: Present totitos as a celebration of impact, not as currency
